name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Kent Edward CONSHAFTER, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Conshafter

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Kent Edward CONSHAFTER, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 15th day of July, 1997, upon consideration of the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board dated May 21,1997, it is hereby
ORDERED that KENT EDWARD CONSHAFTER be and he is DISBARRED from the Bar of this Commonwealth, retroactive to July 1, 1996, and he shall comply with all the provisions of Rule 217 Pa.R.D.E.
It is further ORDERED that respondent shall pay costs to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
699 A.2d 710
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Kent Edward CONSHAFTER, Respondent.
No. 216 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 15, 1997.
